entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
